article.name: astral-construct
article.contents:
--- class: Psion name: Astral Construct title: Astral Construct school: Metacreativity rank: 1 type: Enhancement brief: Create an astral construct in the form of a minion. ---
At-will, swift, reserves 1 Focus; create a Medium astral construct (rules TBD). For more mana, make a bigger one.
article.bodyHtml: At-will, swift, reserves 1 Focus; create a Medium astral construct (rules TBD). For more mana, make a bigger one.

metadata.name: Astral Construct
metadata.title: Astral Construct
metadata.brief: Create an astral construct in the form of a minion.
